sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an ace of spades from a standard deck of cards, given that the card drawn is not returned to the deck?
message_2: In a standard deck of 52 cards, there is only 1 Ace of Spades. Since the card drawn is not returned to the deck, the probability of drawing the Ace of Spades in a single draw is 1 out of 52. Therefore, the probability is 1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%.
